title: Updated to 6.20, "Server not Responding" Error
body:
I updated to patch 6.20 today with no problems (i.e patcher didn't get stuck, etc.). When I get to the login screen, I enter my details and get the message that says that the server is not responding.

My internet connection is fine, and the Service Status website says that the server is working normally. I have tried running as administrator but I still get the same result.

Anyone else having the same problem? Anyone have any tips aside from reinstalling?

replies.body: Even if your internet is fine, it sounds like your network is specifically having issues connecting to the login server.  Go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved!  Let me know if you have any questions.
